00186     template<class ChromosomeTemplate> void append( const ChromosomeTemplate& chrom ){
00187       ChromosomeTemplate* newChrom=new ChromosomeTemplate(chrom);
00188       std::vector< Chromosome * >::push_back( newChrom );
00189       newChrom->registerIndividual(*this,size()-1);
00190     }

00211     unsigned getNoOfDisplVal() const { return noDisplVal;};
00212  
00213     void initDisplVal(unsigned o=0){
00214       noDisplVal = o;
00215       displVal.resize(getNoOfDisplVal());
00216     }
00217 
00218     void setDisplVal     ( unsigned i, double e = 0)  { 
00219       if(i<displVal.size()) displVal[i] = e;
00220       else{
00221         std::cerr << "Individual.h: Individuals error value buffer not correctly initialized!" 
00222                   << std::endl; exit(0);
00223       }
00224     }
00225 
00226     double getDisplVal   ( unsigned i ) const         {
00227       if(i<displVal.size()) return displVal[i];    
00228       else{ 
00229         std::cerr << "Individual.h: Individuals error value buffer not correctly initialized!" 
00230                   << std::endl; exit(0);
00231       }
00232     }

00296 #ifndef __NO_GENERIC_IOSTREAM
00297     friend std::ostream& operator << ( std::ostream& os,
00298                                        const Individual& ind ) {
00299       os << "Individual(" << ind.size( ) << ")\n"
00300          << ind.fitness       << '\n'
00301          << ind.scaledFitness << '\n'
00302          << ind.evalFlg       << '\n'
00303          << ind.feasible      << '\n'
00304          << ind.selProb       << '\n'
00305          << ind.numCopies     << '\n'
00306          << ind.elitist       << '\n'
00307          << ind.age           << '\n'      
00308          << ind.learnTime     << '\n'    
00309          << ind.getNoOfDisplVal();
00310          // added by Stefan Wiegand 07.01.2004
00311          for(unsigned ii=0; ii<ind.getNoOfDisplVal();ii++)
00312            os << '\n' << ind.getDisplVal(ii);
00313       os << std::endl;
00314           
00315       for( unsigned i = 0; i < ind.size( ); ++i )
00316           os << '\n' << ind[ i ];
00317         os << std::endl;
00318       return os;
00319     }
00320 
00321     friend std::istream& operator >> ( std::istream& is, Individual& ind ){
00322       unsigned i, indSize( 0 );
00323       std::string s, t;
00324       double e;
00325 
00326       is >> s;
00327       is.get( );   // skip end of line
00328       
00329       if( is.good( ) &&
00330           s.substr( 0, 11 ) == "Individual(" &&
00331           s.find( ')' ) != std::string::npos ) {
00332 
00333         // Extract the size indication from the string:
00334         t = s.substr( s.find( '(' )+1, s.find( ')' ) - s.find( '(' ) - 1 );
00335         indSize = atoi( t.c_str( ) );
00336 
00337         // Adapt size of Individual:
00338         ind.resize( indSize );
00339 
00340         is >> ind.fitness
00341            >> ind.scaledFitness
00342            >> ind.evalFlg
00343            >> ind.feasible
00344            >> ind.selProb
00345            >> ind.numCopies
00346            >> ind.elitist
00347            >> ind.age
00348            >> ind.learnTime
00349            >> ind.noDisplVal;
00350         // added by Stefan Wiegand 07.01.2004
00351         ind.initDisplVal(ind.getNoOfDisplVal());
00352         for(i=0; i<ind.getNoOfDisplVal();i++){
00353           is >> e;
00354           ind.setDisplVal(i,e);
00355         }
00356         for( i = 0; i < ind.size( ); ++i )
00357           is >> ind[ i ];       
00358       }
00359       return is;
00360     }
00361 #endif // !__NO_GENERIC_IOSTREAM
